N

Node - Class in GraphComponents
Class that represent node in graph, implements Comparable the main component of the graph Variables (1) index (to identifies each node) (2) array list of adjacent nodes -nodes having an arch connects them with this node in the graph (3) point3D- point itself on the map in game view (Pixel) (4) distance from source (5) the previous node to this one in the shortest way from the source (4) array list of nodes preceding this node in the shortest way from the source In addition, each node have a comparator that will help in the shortest path building (compare by distances)
Node(int, Point3D) - Constructor for class GraphComponents.Node
Constructor The index will be 0 if this is the source node - (useful for the class of the algorithm), and will be the last of the node's index on the graph if this is the target.
Node(Node) - Constructor for class GraphComponents.Node
Deep copy constructor
NodeComperator - Class in GraphComponents
 
NodeComperator() - Constructor for class GraphComponents.NodeComperator
 
north_angle(Point3D) - Method in class Coords.Pixel
 
north_angle(Point3D) - Method in class Geom.Point3D
return the planer angle of the vector between this point to other point p, in DEGREES, in a compass order: north 0, east 90, south 180, west 270.
